p: There was a significant effect of shade on N (F = 20.082, p < 0.001) and a significant interaction effect of shade X lime X competition (F = 11.349, p = 0.001) but no other significant interactions or main effects. There was a significant effect of shade (F = 39.842, p < 0.001) and lime (F = 9.454, p = 0.003) on the concentration of nitrogen belowground ( Fig 3). There were no other significant main or interaction effects.
